sources.title: Everyman's Law (1936) JOHNNY MACK BROWN
sources.description:
FIRST TIME ON YOUTUBE!
Stars: Johnny Mack Brown, Beth Marion, Frank Campeau
Director: Albert Ray

A Texas Ranger poses as a hired gun to uncover a plot by a cattle baron who is robbing the land of the smaller ranches and homesteaders.

metadata.Plot: Jim Morgan, in cahoots with the Sheriff, hires three wanted gunmen Dog Town Kid, Gibbs, and Pike and makes them Deputies. He wants them to kick the homesteaders off their land. The Kid then arrests the outlaw Lobo Joe. When the three fail him, Morgan turns to Lobo Joe with disastrous results.
metadata.Actors: Johnny Mack Brown, Beth Marion, Frank Campeau
